title: Several Mathewson dark caps for sale

posts.post_title: Several Mathewson dark caps for sale
posts.post_content:
Selling what’s left of my Matty dark cap back run

Piedmont 350-460 sgc 5.5 should cross to psa 6 $1,750
Sweet Cap 350-460 sgc 4 $1,000
Sovereign 350 sgc 3.5 $800
Have 4 others averaging 3.0. For better pics email [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
5.5 and Sovereign are sold. Still about 5 sweet caps left in the 3 range and a polar bear 4

Great cards ! Can you help me with a white cap?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
